overview_of_class: Develop design thinking skills while building creative confidence. This studio based course will introduce students to projects that will lay the foundation for a bias toward action, and a deeper understanding of the personal skills and expertise that design thinkers utilize in all phases of the design process. Explore modern design masters and the state of the art visualization methods while developing your own voice in design. Emphasis will be placed on personal growth and design portfolio development.
name: Industrial Design Projects I
title: MEAS DSGN 380-1-20 Industrial Design Projects I

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Develop design thinking skills while building creative confidence. This studio based course will introduce students to projects that will lay the foundation for a bias toward action, and a deeper understanding of the personal skills and expertise that design thinkers utilize in all phases of the design process. Explore modern design masters and the state of the art visualization methods while developing your own voice in design. Emphasis will be placed on personal growth and design portfolio development.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Course prerequisites or Instructor approval - Intro to Solidworks and Sketching or Intro to Industrial Design Methods

subject: DSGN
